trans-unit.source: Exposes instance methods for creating, moving, and enumerating through directories and subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 公開建立、 移動和全面列舉目錄和子目錄的執行個體方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: To browse the .NET Framework source code for this type, see the [Reference Source](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#mscorlib/system/io/directoryinfo.cs#30fa608717e5ce8e).
trans-unit.target: 若要瀏覽此類型的.NET Framework 原始程式碼，請參閱[參考來源](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#mscorlib/system/io/directoryinfo.cs#30fa608717e5ce8e)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref> class on the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref>類別上指定的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not check if a directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不會檢查目錄是否存在。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is a placeholder for a string that is used to access the disk in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式是字串，用來存取後續作業中的磁碟的預留位置。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can be a file name, including a file on a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) share.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以是檔案名稱，包括通用命名慣例 (UNC) 共用上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 字元當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，可能會無法解譯，並可能會導致擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the path on which to create the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DirectoryInfo" name="DirectoryInfo" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定要在其中建立路徑<xref uid="langword_csharp_DirectoryInfo" name="DirectoryInfo" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: path contains invalid characters such as ", <, >, or |.
trans-unit.target: path包含無效的字元，例如"， <， >，或 |。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，windows 平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，和檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both are too long.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都太長。

trans-unit.source: Creates a directory.
trans-unit.target: 建立目錄。

trans-unit.source: If the directory already exists, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果目錄已經存在，這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The directory cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立目錄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a directory using a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立目錄，使用<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload to create a directory with access control, so there is no chance the directory can be accessed before security is applied.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法多載來建立使用存取控制的目錄，因此沒有機會可以存取目錄，才能套用安全性。

trans-unit.source: If the directory already exists, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果目錄已經存在，這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The access control to apply to the directory.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至目錄的存取控制。

trans-unit.source: The directory specified by path is read-only or is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的目錄 path 是唯讀的或不是空的。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: path is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by .
trans-unit.target: path為零長度字串、 只包含空格，或包含一或多個無效字元所定義的。

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，windows 平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，和檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: Creating a directory with only the colon (:) character was attempted.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試建立目錄，以冒號 （:） 字元。

trans-unit.source: Creates a subdirectory or subdirectories on the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 指定路徑上建立子目錄。

trans-unit.source: The specified path can be relative to this instance of the <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑可以相對於此執行個體<xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Any and all directories specified in `path` are created, unless some part of `path` is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的所有目錄`path`會建立，除非有部分的`path`無效。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter specifies a directory path, not a file path.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數會指定一個目錄路徑，而不是檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: If the subdirectory already exists, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果子目錄已存在，這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Path names are limited to 248 characters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 路徑名稱會限制為 248 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Deletes this instance of a <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref>, specifying whether to delete subdirectories and files.
trans-unit.target: 刪除此執行個體<xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"> </xref>，指定是否刪除子目錄和檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the `DirectoryInfo` has no files or subdirectories, this method deletes the `DirectoryInfo` even if `recursive` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`DirectoryInfo`沒有檔案或子目錄，這個方法會刪除`DirectoryInfo`即使`recursive`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to delete a `DirectoryInfo` that is not empty when `recursive` is `false` throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試刪除`DirectoryInfo`，不是空的時`recursive`是`false` <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException>會擲回

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of directory information in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前目錄中的目錄資訊的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: The EnumerateDirectories and <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows: - When you use EnumerateDirectories, you can start enumerating the collection of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> objects before the whole collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: EnumerateDirectories 和<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>方法不同，如下所示:-當您使用 EnumerateDirectories，您可以開始列舉的集合<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>物件之前，會傳回整個集合。</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> objects to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: -當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>，您必須等待的整個陣列<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>才能存取陣列傳回物件。</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, EnumerateDirectories can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您正在使用許多檔案和目錄，EnumerateDirectories 可以更有效率。

trans-unit.source: This method pre-populates the values of the following <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> properties: - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Attributes%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTime%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTime%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTimeUtc%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTime%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTimeUtc%2A> The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> method on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會預先填入的下列值<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>屬性:- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Attributes%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTime%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTime%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTimeUtc%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTime%2A>-<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTimeUtc%2A>傳回的集合不會快取，則每個呼叫<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>集合上的方法將會啟動新的列舉。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTimeUtc%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTime%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTimeUtc%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTime%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTime%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Attributes%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of directories in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 目前的目錄中目錄的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: The path encapsulated in the <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref> object is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 在封裝的路徑<xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref>物件無效 （例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上）。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of directory information that matches a specified search pattern.
trans-unit.target: 傳回符合指定的搜尋模式的目錄資訊的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of directories.
trans-unit.target: 要比對目錄名稱的搜尋字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters (see Remarks), but doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以包含組合的有效常值路徑與萬用 (* 和？) 字元 （請參閱 < 備註 >），但不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The default pattern is "\*", which returns all files.
trans-unit.target: 預設模式是 「\*"，這會傳回所有檔案。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of directories that matches searchPattern.
trans-unit.target: 比對目錄的可列舉集合 searchPattern 。

trans-unit.source: searchPattern is .
trans-unit.target: searchPatternis .

trans-unit.source: The path encapsulated in the <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref> object is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 在封裝的路徑<xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref>物件無效 （例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上）。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of directory information that matches a specified search pattern and search subdirectory option.
trans-unit.target: 傳回符合指定的搜尋模式和搜尋子目錄選項的目錄資訊的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of directories.
trans-unit.target: 要比對目錄名稱的搜尋字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters (see Remarks), but doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以包含組合的有效常值路徑與萬用 (* 和？) 字元 （請參閱 < 備註 >），但不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The default pattern is "\*", which returns all files.
trans-unit.target: 預設模式是 「\*"，這會傳回所有檔案。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include only the current directory or all subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定搜尋作業中是否包含目前的目錄或所有子目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.IO.SearchOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.IO.SearchOption"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of directories that matches searchPattern and searchOption.
trans-unit.target: 比對目錄的可列舉集合 searchPattern 和 searchOption 。

trans-unit.source: searchPattern is .
trans-unit.target: searchPatternis .

trans-unit.source: searchOption is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: searchOption不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: The path encapsulated in the <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref> object is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 在封裝的路徑<xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref>物件無效 （例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上）。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of file information in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前目錄中的檔案資訊的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: The EnumerateFiles and <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> methods differ as follows: - When you use EnumerateFiles, you can start enumerating the collection of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> objects before the whole collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: EnumerateFiles 和<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>方法不同，如下所示:-當您使用 EnumerateFiles，您可以開始列舉的集合<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件之前，會傳回整個集合。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> objects to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: -當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>，您必須等待的整個陣列<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>才能存取陣列傳回物件。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, EnumerateFiles can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您正在使用許多檔案和目錄，EnumerateFiles 可以更有效率。

trans-unit.source: This method pre-populates the values of the following <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> properties: - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Attributes%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTime%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTime%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTimeUtc%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTime%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTimeUtc%2A> - <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Length%2A> The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> method on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會預先填入的下列值<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>屬性:- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Attributes%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTime%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTime%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTimeUtc%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTime%2A>- <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTimeUtc%2A>-<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Length%2A>傳回的集合不會快取，則每個呼叫<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>集合上的方法將會啟動新的列舉。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Length%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTimeUtc%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTime%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTimeUtc%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTime%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTime%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Attributes%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目錄是否存在。

trans-unit.source: The Exists property returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: Exists 屬性會傳回`false`如果發生任何錯誤時嘗試判斷指定的檔案是否存在。

trans-unit.source: This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file.
trans-unit.target: 可能發生這種情況下，會引發例外狀況，例如傳遞檔名無效的字元或太多的字元，失敗或遺失的磁碟，或如果呼叫端沒有讀取檔案的權限。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the directory exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目錄存在。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref> object that encapsulates the access control list (ACL) entries for the directory described by the current <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref>物件會封裝目前所描述的目錄存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目<xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> method overload and specifying the access control sections <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName> | <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName> | <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName> (<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName>`Or`<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName>`Or`<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法多載就相當於呼叫<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>方法多載，並指定存取控制區段<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName> |<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName> (<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName>`Or`<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName>`Or`<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName> in Visual Basic).</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the GetAccessControl method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for the current file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 GetAccessControl 方法來擷取目前的檔案之存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案或目錄上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 加入或移除存取控制清單項目](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref> object that encapsulates the access control rules for the directory.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"> </xref>封裝目錄的存取控制規則的物件。

trans-unit.source: The directory could not be found or modified.
trans-unit.target: 找不到或無法修改目錄。

trans-unit.source: The directory is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 目錄是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: -or- This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: -或者-目前的平台不支援此作業。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: -或者-呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the directory.
trans-unit.target: 開啟目錄時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref> object that encapsulates the specified type of access control list (ACL) entries for the directory described by the current <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref>封裝的描述由目前的目錄的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目之指定的類型的物件<xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetAccessControl method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for the current file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 GetAccessControl 方法來擷取目前的檔案之存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案或目錄上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 加入或移除存取控制清單項目](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref> values that specifies the type of access control list (ACL) information to receive.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref>值，指定類型的存取控制清單 (ACL) 資訊，接收。

trans-unit.source: A object that encapsulates the access control rules for the file described by the path parameter.
trans-unit.target: A 規則所描述的檔案封裝的存取控制的物件 path 參數。

trans-unit.source: Returns a file list from the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 從目前目錄傳回檔案清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> and GetFiles methods differ as follows: - When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> objects before the whole collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>而 GetFiles 方法不同，如下所示:-當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>，您可以開始列舉的集合<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件之前，會傳回整個集合。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When you use GetFiles, you must wait for the whole array of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> objects to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: -當您使用 GetFiles 時，您必須等待的整個陣列<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>才能存取陣列傳回物件。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能會更有效率。</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there are no files in the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>, this method returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何檔案在<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>，這個方法會傳回空陣列。</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned file names is not guaranteed; use the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A> method if a specific sort order is required.
trans-unit.target: 不保證的順序傳回的檔案名稱;使用<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>方法是否需要特定的排序次序。</xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default pattern is "\*", which returns all files.
trans-unit.target: 預設模式是 「\*"，這會傳回所有檔案。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include only the current directory or all subdirectories.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.IO.SearchOption"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: It can be an existing directory to which you want to add this directory as a subdirectory.

trans-unit.source: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref> object to the directory described by the current <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 適用於所描述的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref>描述由目前的目錄物件<xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An access control list (ACL) describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 存取控制清單 (ACL) 說明個人和/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案或目錄上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 加入或移除存取控制清單項目](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The SetAccessControl method applies ACL entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list.
trans-unit.target: SetAccessControl 方法適用於代表 noninherited 的 ACL 清單的檔案 ACL 項目。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The ACL specified for `directorySecurity` replaces the existing ACL for the directory.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > ACL 指定`directorySecurity`取代現有目錄的 ACL。

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing ACL, and modify it.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入之新使用者的權限，使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來取得現有的 ACL，並修改它。</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SetAccessControl method persists only <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> objects that have been modified after object creation.
trans-unit.target: 只保存 SetAccessControl 方法<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件建立後已修改的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>不修改物件，不會保存至檔案。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object from one file and reapply the same object to another file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不可以擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件從一個檔案，並重新套用到另一個檔案的相同物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>

trans-unit.source: To copy ACL information from one file to another: 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要將 ACL 資訊從一個檔案複製到另一個︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object from the source file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>從原始程式檔的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object for the destination file.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>目的地檔案的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method of the source <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object to retrieve the ACL information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>來源方法<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>擷取 ACL 資訊的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法可複製的資訊擷取到目的地的步驟 3 中<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object to the destination file using the SetAccessControl method.
trans-unit.target: 設定目的地<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>使用 SetAccessControl 方法的目的檔案的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>

trans-unit.target: 物件，描述要套用至所描述之目錄的 ACL 項目`path`參數。
